welcome_message: 💧 Hi, {name}! Welcome to your personal hydration assistant! Water is the essence of life, and maintaining proper hydration is crucial for your health and well-being. 🧬 Regular water intake helps improve brain function 🧠, keeps your energy levels up ⚡, and even promotes healthy skin 🌟. Our bot is here to remind you to drink water, track your progress, and help you achieve your hydration goals every day. Let's embark on this exciting journey to a healthier and more hydrated body together! 💪
